howItWorks.title: Get Started in Minutes

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and get instant access to your developer dashboard.

step2.title: Get API Keys
step2.description: Generate your API credentials and configure your sandbox environment.

step3.title: Integrate & Test
step3.description: Use our SDKs and comprehensive documentation to integrate quickly.

step4.title: Go Live
step4.description: Switch to production and start processing real transactions instantly.

recentTransactions.title: Recent Transactions
recentTransactions.description: Latest test transactions in your sandbox environment

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include sandbox access and developer support.

exceedLimit.question: What happens if I exceed my API call limit?
exceedLimit.answer: Your API calls will continue to work, and you'll be charged $0.10 per 1,000 additional calls. We'll notify you when you reach 80% and 100% of your limit.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan later?
changePlan.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate the billing.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: The Starter plan is completely free forever with 50,000 API calls per month. You can upgrade to paid plans when you're ready.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers for Enterprise plans, and can work with custom invoicing arrangements.

refundPolicy.question: What is your refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
